SELECT * FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno
AND c.parking = 1
AND c.pet = 1
AND c.kids = 1
AND c.group = 1
GROUP BY c.cno
SELECT * , round(AVG(r.score),2) AS avgscore, round(AVG(r.waiting),0) AS avgwait FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno WHERE c.cno = #{cno}
SELECT * FROM review WHERE cno = #{cno} LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno LEFT JOIN list l ON c.cno = li_cafe1 OR c.cno = li_cafe2 OR c.cno = li_cafe3 OR c.cno = li_cafe4 OR c.cno = li_cafe5 WHERE lino = #{lino} GROUP BY c.cno
SELECT * FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno LEFT JOIN bmk_cafe b ON c.cno = b.cno LEFT JOIN member m ON m.username = b.username WHERE m.username = #{username} GROUP BY c.cno

SELECT * FROM bmk_list b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.username = m.username LEFT JOIN list l ON l.lino = b.lino LEFT JOIN cafe c ON c.cno = l.li_cafe1 OR cno = li_cafe2 OR cno = li_cafe3 OR cno = li_cafe4 OR cno = li_cafe5 WHERE b.username = #{username} GROUP BY l.liname

SELECT *, COUNT(b.cno)AS cnt FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno left JOIN bmk_cafe b ON b.cno = c.cno
AND c.parking = 1
AND c.pet = 1
AND c.kids = 1
AND c.group = 1
GROUP BY c.cno ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT *, COUNT(r.cno)AS cnt FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno
AND c.parking = 1
AND c.pet = 1
AND c.kids = 1
AND c.group = 1
GROUP BY c.cno ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT *, AVG(r.score) AS avg FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.cno = r.cno
AND c.parking = 1
AND c.pet = 1
AND c.kids = 1
AND c.group = 1
GROUP BY c.cno ORDER BY AVG DESC
